name: deskmaster-mcp
description: DeskMaster MCP - Naver Shopping UIA-based List Scanner

scripts.install-mcp-servers: npm run install:windows-automation && npm run install:gemini
scripts.install:windows-automation: cd mcp-servers && git clone https://github.com/mario-andreschak/mcp-windows-desktop-automation.git && cd mcp-windows-desktop-automation && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:gemini: echo 'Gemini MCP will be installed via npx'
